General.Name: Soquicom
General.Description: Soquimich Comercial S.A. manufactures, markets, and imports plant nutrition products in Chile. It offers water-soluble fertilizers; granulated fertilizers; specialty plant nutrition products for foliar application; organic products for use in organic agriculture; custom made soluble and granulated mixes; and other products. The company was founded in 1987 and is based in Santiago, Chile. Soquimich Comercial S.A. operates as a subsidiary of SQM Industrial S.A.
General.Address: Los Militares 4290, Santiago de Chile, Chile

2.Name: Ms. Claudia  Diaz Acuña
2.Title: Mang. of Marketing, Communications, Innovation & Culture
